Name: Absolution
Effect: [Insurgence] While New Moon is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Special Attribute. If Sunny weather is in effect, this Pokémon will receive 1 damage at the end of the round.

Name: Adaptability
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon uses a Damaging Move that matches its Type, add 1 Dice to the Damage pool of that attack.
Description: The Pokémon will easily adapt to its surroundings, it will travel with ease no matter the terrain.

Name: Aerilate
Effect: Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokémon uses will deal damage as if they were Flying-Type, affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 Dice of damage to Flying moves.
Description: The Pokémon never touches the ground, a neverending wind current can be felt swirling around it.

Name: Aftermath
Effect: If this Pokémon faints due to a Non-Ranged Physical Attack , the user of that attack is dealt 2 Damage.
Description: When hurt or upset, the Pokémon will prepare to burst. If hit hard enough, it will explode on contact

Name: Air Lock
Effect: Negate all the effects of a Weather Condition in the field. If there are no weather conditions in the field, they cannot be activated by Moves or Abilities. If one is already active, it does not disappear but provides no effects.
Description: The Pokémon surrounds itself in a vacuum. Every Particle of rain, sand, and hail stands floating still around it, and even heat is filtered out of the place.

Name: Amplifier
Effect: [Insurgence] All sound-based moves now receive 1 additional damage dice.

Name: Analytic
Effect: If this Pokémon has a lower initiative than its target, Add 1 Dice to all of its Damage Pools.
Description: The Pokémon will never charge recklessly, it will take a moment to think about the best decision to make in any situation.

Name: Ancient Presence
Effect: The user's moves becomes typeless and will always hit regardless of abilities.

Name: Anger Point
Effect: If a foe lands a Critical Hit on this Pokémon, increase 3 Points to its Strength Attribute.
Description: The Pokémon will easily get aggressive. Little to no provocation is needed for it to start throwing a tantrum and ripping everything to shreds.

Name: Anticipation
Effect: If a foe knows a move that would deal Lethal or Super Effective damage against this Pokémon, it will alert its Trainer.
Description: The Pokémon is always alert for threats and rarely sits to relax. If it perceives a potential danger it will get anxious and start shuddering.

Name: Arena Trap
Effect: Foe Pokémon on the ground become Blocked, they cannot escape or be switched out for as long as this Pokémon is in the field.
Description: The gound around this Pokémon becomes really soft and hard to walk in. When in danger, it will sink the ground around itself creating a shifting sand pit.

Name: Aroma Veil
Effect: User and Allies in range are immune to the effects of the moves: Taunt, Torment Attract, Disable, Encore, and Heal Block.
Description: This Pokémon lets off a nice smell that helps you to stay relaxed even under stressful situations

Name: Athenian
Effect: This Pokémon has a permanent increase of 1 point to its Special attribute.

Name: Aura Break
Effect: Invert the effects that the Abilities Dark Aura and Fairy Aura have on their users. If said Abilities would increase a Dice Pool for their user, reduce it instead.
Description: Anyone emitting a particularly evil aura will be purified, anyone with an aura of purity will be corrupted by evil by coming close to this Pokémon

Name: Bad Dreams
Effect: At the end of the Round, deal 1 Damage to anyone in the battlefield that has the Sleep Status Condition.
Description: This Pokémon can transfer its evil intent through the world of dreams, wreaking havoc and bringing fear into the minds of those deep in slumber

Name: Ball Fetch
Effect: Whenever you throw a pokéball to a wild Pokémon, if the roll for catching it is unsuccessful, the pokéball will not break, this Pokémon will bring it back to you at the end of the scene instead.
Description: The Pokémon is a bit obsessed with playing "Fetch the Ball". It can play for hours and hours and never get bored of it.

Name: Battery
Effect: Increase 1 point to the Special of all Ally Pokémon in Range. Ally Pokémon get 1 Bonus Dice to all their Special Move's Damage Pool.
Description: This Pokémon's presence creates an electric field that charges up electronics and even makes others feel energized.

Name: Battle Armor
Effect: If a Foe lands a Critical Hit on this Pokémon, it will not get any Bonus Dice for it.
Description: The skin of the Pokémon is covered by plates of a very resistant material, like rock, steel, or an exoskeleton.

Name: Battle Bond
Effect:
AFTER a foe is defeated by this Pokémon, if it has a Loyalty score of 5, change its Form into “Battle-Bond Form” (BBF) until the end of the scene or until it or its Trainer faints. Only one Pokémon per party may have this Ability. Pokémon with this Ability can't hold a Mega-Stone. 
- BBF increases by 2 the Limits of Strength and
 Special of the Pokémon.
- Redistribute Rank points on BBF as you see fit.
- Increase by 1 the Power of a Move of your choice.
- Restore its full HP & Will, and heal any Status
 Ailment upon changing forms.
- When in BBF, all combat damage inflicted on the Pokémon will also be dealt to its Trainer.
Description: The Pokémon forges a strong bond with those who face the fiercest battles. After a victory, a surge of power surfaces thanks to their friendship.

Name: Beast Boost
Effect: If a foe faints because of an attack dealt by this Ultra-Beast, Increase 1 Point to its Attribute with highest limit. Up to 3 points can be increased this way. Only Ultra-Beasts might have this Ability. Beast Boost can't be swapped or copied.
Description: A wicked satisfaction grows as this creature brings out destruction, for it becomes more savage with every foe that falls to its power.

Name: Berserk
Effect: When this Pokémon's HP is half or less, Increase its Special Attribute by 1.
Description: This Pokémon is usually calm in demeanor, but when its life or someone it cares for is in danger, the adrenaline rush will transform it into an enranged beast.

Name: Big Pecks
Effect: This Pokémon cannot have its Defense reduced.
Description: This tenacious Pokémon uses its beak to cover its weak spots.

Name: Blaze
Effect: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Fire-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.
Description: The Fire on this Pokémon's body will burn incredibly fierce just before fading.

Name: Blaze Boost
Effect: Immediately before using a Fire type move. Increase the user's Special, Special Defense and Dexterity by 1. Change Emolga to Blaze Boost form. In this form, whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, roll 1 Chance Dice to inflict Burn 1 on the foe.

Name: Bulletproof
Effect: Reduce by 1 all damage from Special and Ranged Physical Attacks done to this Pokémon.
Description: The armor on this Pokémon's body protects it from projectiles and small explosions.

Name: Cheek Pouch
Effect: This Pokémon restores 2 HP whenever it eats a berry with no HP healing effect. (e.g. Pecha Berry, Lum Berry)
Description: The Pokémon is able to store food and objects inside its stretchy cheeks for later consumption.

Name: Chlorofury
Effect: When Mega evolving or on switch in. Increase the user's Dexterity by 1 and its Special by X for 2 turns. X is the number of fainted teammates on this Pokemon's team.

Name: Chlorophyll
Effect: If Sunny Weather is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Dexterity Attribute.
Description: The Pokémon synthesizes sunlight to get energy, if it's kept in a sunny environment it will rarely need to eat.

Name: Clear Body
Effect: Other Pokémon cannot Increase or Decrease the Attributes of this Pokémon. This Pokémon can still Increase or Decrease its own Attributes.
Description: The Pokémon is completely aware of all its body surroundings, trying to sneak on it will be incredibly difficult.

Name: Cloud Nine
Effect: Negate the effects of Weather Conditions on this Pokémon. This does not include: Harsh Sunlight, Typhoon and Strong Winds
Description: This Pokémon will easily feel pleased, and it's prone to be heappier than others. No matter if it's sunny or rainy it will never feel gloomy

Name: Color Change
Effect: When this Pokémon is dealt damage it will temporarily change its type to match the type of the move that just hit it. The effect ends if the Pokémon is removed from battle.
Description: This Pokémon can change its color and energy to camouflage and merge with the surroundings.

Name: Comatose
Effect: The Pokémon permanently has the “Sleep” Status Condition but it is immune to its effects. This Pokémon can't be inflicted other Status Condition. Moves and Abilities affecting Asleep Pokémon still have an effect on it.
Description: For some reason this Pokémon is always asleep and can't wake up. Still, it is able to understand commands and move just as if it were sleepwalking

Name: Competitive
Effect: The first time this Pokémon gets an Attribute reduced by a foe during a battle, increase 2 Points to its Special.
Description: This Pokémon's determination grows in the face of adversity. It is always trying to compete with those around it.

Name: Compound Eyes
Effect: This Pokémon gets 2 Bonus Dice on the Accuracy Pool of any move with Reduced Accuracy.
Description: This Pokémon has peripheral vision that allows it to locate its targets with great precision.

Name: Contrary
Effect: If anything would Decrease an Attribute of this Pokémon, Increase it instead. If anything would Increase an Attribute of this Pokémon, Decrease it instead.
Description: Most of the time this pokémon will want to do the opposite of what you want. Sometimes it even contradicts itself.

Name: Corrosion
Effect: Ignore any immunity the foe has to Poison-Type Damage and/or to be inflicted Poison and Badly Poisoned Status Ailments.
Description: This Pokémon's venom can eat through metal, wood, and most inorganic and organic materials. Be careful not to touch it.

Name: Cotton Down
Effect: Is Pokémon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, reduce the speed of all Pokémon close to it. (Allies and foes alike at storyteller's discretion)
Description: The cotton fluff on this Pokémon's body is constantly being shed, it can be used to make beautiful clothes but it's also bothersome to walk on.

Name: Curious Medicine
Effect: (provisional) When the Pokémon enters a battle, it scatters medicine from its shell, which removes all stat changes from allies.

Name: Cursed Body
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon is dealt damage with a Move, Roll 3 Chance Dice to disable that move. More than one Move may be disabled this way.
Description: This Pokémon carries a curse within itself. Crossing this Pokémon is not a good idea.

Name: Cute Charm
Effect: If a foe hits this Pokémon with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, roll 3 Chance Dice to make the foe fall in Love
Description: It may be its twinkly eyes or its rosy cheeks, but other people and Pokémon will try to win this Pokémon's heart.

Name: Damp
Effect: No ally or foe will be able to use the moves Explosion or Self-Destruct in an area around this Pokémon.
Description: The Pokémon gathers the humidity in the air around itself. Lighting a spark or keeping a fire on, will be almost impossible close to it.

Name: Dancer
Effect: Whenever a Pokémon uses a Move with the word “Dance” (i.e. Dragon Dance, Petal Dance etc.) This Pokémon gets a free action to use the same Move immediately after and succeeds automatically. (Damage must be rolled)
Description: When someone begins to dance, this Pokémon dances to. It expresses its feelings and communicates through little jigs.

Name: Dark Aura
Effect: Increase 2 dice to all Damage Pools of Dark-Type Moves of all Pokémon in the field. This effect does not stack. Pokémon and Trainers on the field will not cooperate with each other.
Description: A powerful black aura comes out of this Pokémon, Shrouding the field in darkness and filling everyone's hearts with evil, selfishness and corruption.

Name: Dauntless Shield
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon enters battle, Increase 2 Points to its Defense. Outside of battle, this Pokémon is immune to physical damage.
Description: The valorous resolve of this Pokémon makes it impervious to physical damage through sheer will. Its presence can be unnerving.

Name: Dazzling
Effect: Foes cannot use Priotity Moves against this Pokémon.
Description: Its beautiful scales reflect light in a mirror-like manner, no one can help but to stop in their tracks when they glance at this Pokémon.

Name: Defeatist
Effect: If this Pokémon is at half or less of its total HP, roll this Pokemon's Loyalty every action, if the roll fails Reduce 2 Points to its Strength and Special Attributes for that action. If it's successful it may keep its attributes unchaged.
Description: This Pokémon is a pessimist by nature. When things get difficult, it will be the first to give up.

Name: Defiant
Effect: The first time this Pokémon has an Attribute reduced during a battle, Increase 2 Points to its Strength.
Description: This Pokémon will not yield, the harder the situation gets, the higher its fighting spirit will grow. It may, however, be a bit of a rebel.

Name: Delta Stream
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Strong Wind Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate, The Pokémon with highest Will might keep the dominant weather)
Description: The wind currents blow through the entire battlefield, Pokémon might be blown away if they don't know how to fly.

Name: Desolate Land
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Harsh Sunlight Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate, The Pokémon with highest Will might keep the dominant weather)
Description: The sun burns so hot your skin gets red and blistered, all water evaporates, and every step of this Pokémon makes the ground become molten lava.

Name: Disguise
Effect: The first time this Pokémon would receive damage during a battle, reduce that damage to zero. Entry Hazards, Weather Conditions and Status Ailments do not trigger this Ability
Description: This Pokémon wears a convincing disguise of another Pokémon. If it receives damage, the disguise will break, making it appear as if it received a fatal injury.

Name: Download
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out it will scan its foes and provide information about them. It will then Increase 1 Point to either Strength or Special Attribute at Storyteller's discretion

Name: Drizzle
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Rain Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant weather)

Name: Drought
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Sunny Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant weather)
Description: The Sunlight will be harsly bright, and the heat will increase in the field for as long as this Pokémon wants to.

Name: Dry Skin
Effect: If Sunny Weather is in effect, this Pokémon will receive 1 damage at the end of each round. Fire attacks will deal 1 additional Damage to this Pokémon. Water attacks may heal 1 HP to this Pokémon instead of dealing damage.
Description: The skin of this Pokémon will need special care, constant hydration and protection against heat.

Name: Early Bird
Effect: The time this Pokémon would be asleep is reduced by half, it will only need to score 2 successes on its Insight roll to wake up in battle. This effect does not apply for the move “Rest”
Description: Pokémon with this ability are light sleepers that will easily rise from slumber. They wake up full of energy with just a couple hours of sleep.

Name: Effect Spore
Effect: If hit by a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, the Pokémon rolls 3 Chance Dice to Poison, Paralize or Sleep the foe at random.
Description: When stressed, this Pokémon will leak spores through its body that scatter in the air causing severe allergies.

Name: Electric Surge
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of the Move Electric Terrain. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant Terrain)
Description: The Pokémon can surround itself with an electric field that fills the air with tension and keeps everyone on edge.

Name: Emergency Exit
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon reaches half or less of its HP, it will switch out to its pokéball, sending an Ally to take its place. If there is no Ally, the battle may end. This Ability's effect is not affected by Block.
Description: The Pokémon makes tactical escapes when the situation escelates out of control. You may force him to fight despite this but it won't like it.

Name: Ethereal Shroud
Effect: The user gains Ghost type associated immunities and resistances.

Name: Fairy Aura
Effect: Increase 2 dice to all Damage Pools of Fairy-Type Moves of all Pokémon in the field. This effect does not stack. Pokémon and Trainers on the field will not attack the user of this Ability.
Description: A powerful pink glowing aura comes out of this Pokémon, covering the field in a glimmering light, filling everyone's hearts with peace, hope, and love.

Name: Filter
Effect: If a foe uses a move that would deal Super Effective Damage to this Pokémon, reduce by 1 the total Damage from that attack.
Description: This Pokémon uses an invisible energy field to filter away harmful energies and substances.

Name: Flame Body
Effect: When hit by a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, this Pokémon rolls 3 Chance Dice to burn the foe.
Description: This Pokémon can willingly ignite its body on fire, receiving no harm from it. Objects that come into contact with this Pokémon may catch fire.

Name: Flare Boost
Effect: If this Pokémon gets any Burn condition, Increase 2 points to its Special attribute.
Description: Pokémon with this ability benefit from the extreme heat produced by fire. It might be somewhat of a pyromaniac.

Name: Flash Fire
Effect: The first time this Pokémon is hit by a Fire-Type move, add 1 Extra Die to the Damage Pool of Fire-type Moves this Pokémon uses until the end of the scene. Fire-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokémon.
Description: This Pokémon is capable of consuming other fire sources and adding them to its own. Walking through embers, fire, lava and hell feel like a breeze to it.

Name: Flower Gift
Effect: If Sunny weather is in effect, Increase 2 Points to the Strength and Sp.Defense Attribute of the user and its allies
Description: This Pokémon's petals radiate full of energy when the sun shines bright. The energy irradiated makes those around feel stronger.

Name: Flower Veil
Effect: User and allies can't have their Attributes reduced. User and allies can't have any Status Condition inflicted on them. Previously inflicted Attribute reductions and/or ailments remain.
Description: This Pokémon makes flowers grow in gardens and near other Pokémon to protect them from harm.

Name: Fluffy
Effect: Reduce by 2 the Damage dealt to this Pokémon by All Physical Attacks. Incread by 2 the Damage dealt to this Pokémon by Fire-Type Attacks.
Description: This Pokémon's fur is so fluffy you could die. So soft and Snuggly that it invites you to hug it. Tumble dry with no heat, do not iron.

Name: Forecast
Effect: The Type of this Pokémon will change depending on the active weather. Fire under Sun, Water under Rain, Ice under Hail and Rock under Sand.
Description: This Pokémon can absorb the elements around to adapt and survive even under extreme conditions.

Name: Forewarn
Effect: In battle, this Pokémon will warn about the strongest move one of its foes has. Storyteller has to reveal it to the trainer of this Pokémon in secret.
Description: When this Pokémon feels bad intentions or disaster approaching, it will mentally warn its trainer. The trainer must make a roll of Insight to get the message.

Name: Foundry
Effect: Rock-Type Attacks that the Pokémon uses will deal damage as if they were Fire-Type, affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 Dice of damage to Fire moves.

Name: Friend Guard
Effect: If this Pokémon is hit by a move performed by an ally, Reduce by 2 the damage dealt to it.
Description: The Pokémon is adorable and wakes the parental instincts in others. All of its allies will seek to potect it all the time.

Name: Frisk
Effect: When this Pokémon enters the battlefield, Storyteller must reveal its trainer the held item of one foe.
Description: This Pokémon can see the items others may be carrying, even if they are hidden.

Name: Full Metal Body
Effect: Other Pokémon cannot Decrease the Attributes of this Pokémon. This Pokémon can still Decrease its own Attributes.
Description: This Pokémon's body is a think metal armor, its shiny coat cannot be muddled. Look inside of it and you may be blinded by the sun's brightness.

Name: Fur Coat
Effect: Reduce by 2 the Damage dealt to this Pokémon by All Physical Attacks.
Description: This Pokémon's fluffy exterior is cuddly, soft, hypoallergenic, and also serves as a cushin against powerful blows.

Name: Gale Wings
Effect: Add +1 Priority to all Flying-Type Moves of this Pokémon.
Description: This pokémon's wings are perfectly designed to ride the roughest winds effortlessly.

Name: Galvanize
Effect: Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokémon uses will deal damage as if they were Electric-Type, affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 Extra Die of Damage to Electric Moves.
Description: The body of this Pokémon is surrounded by electrical currents, this makes it very energized in everything it does.

Name: Gluttony
Effect: This Pokémon can eat any type of food, medicine or herbal medicine with no negative. This pokémon can eat any held berries at any point of the battle as a free action.
Description: This Pokémon eats all day long, it has no problem to find food sources since it's not a picky eater at all.

Name: Gooey
Effect: The first time an opponent hits this Pokémon with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, reduce 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute.
Description: This Pokémon's sticky ooze will rub into anyone that touches it. This may become quite a burden. On the bright side, it is a natural and organic glue.

Name: Gorilla Tactics
Effect: At the start of the fight, choose a Move. Increase 1 point to this Pokémon's Strength Attribute, it can only perform the chosen Move but it may Evade every Round. This effect resets if the Pokémon is recalled from battle.
Description: The Pokémon's manners leave a lot to be desired, it is brutish and uncivilized, its only approach to facing problems

Name: Grass Pelt
Effect: If the effects of the move Grassy Terrain are active, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Defense Attribute.
Description: This Pokémon has a lush coat of grass to protect its body, even if you cut it, it will regrow in a few days.

Name: Grassy Surge
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of the Move Grassy Terrain. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant Terrain)
Description: The Pokémon can surround itself with a grass field that makes it easy to relax and laze around in the sun.

Name: Gulp Missile
Effect: If this Pokémon uses the Moves Surf or Dive, it will change forms after dealing damage. “Gulping Form” if it has more than half HP remaining, “Gorging Form” if it has half or less HP remaining. If the Pokémon is dealt damage by a foe when it is in any of this Forms, deal 2 Dice of Damage and an effect to it. Return this Pokémon to its regular form afterwards.
Description: This Pokémon is an excellent hunter, when diving into a pool of water it will always come out with prey. And it will sometimes use the prey as a weapon.

Name: Guts
Effect: While affected by a Status Condition, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Strength Attribute.
Description: This Pokémon dares to do everything no one else dares to, and won't lose its determination easily. It may be a little reckless, though.

Name: Harvest
Effect: If this Pokémon uses a berry as a held item during a fight, the berry will grow back at the end of the day.
Description: This Pokémon will naturally produce edible fruits in a short period of time, if fed with berries it will start growing them too.

Name: Healer
Effect: If an Ally on the battlefield has a Status Ailment, at the End of the Round this Pokémon rolls 3 Chance Dice to heal it.
Description: The pokémon has healing powers, and will use them without hesitation to aid others.

Name: Heatproof
Effect: Burn 1 deals no Damage to this Pokémon. If this Pokémon is hit by a Fire-Type Attack, Reduce the damage dealt by 2.
Description: This Pokémon can resist very high temperatures without trouble.

Name: Heavy Metal
Effect: This Pokemon weighs twice as much as it's supposed to. Moves with damage based on weight get their damage pool modified accordingly.
Description: The metal covering the body of the Pokémon is so thick it easily doubles the normal weight of the Pokémon.

Name: Heliophobia
Effect: If Sunny Weather is in effect, this Pokémon will receive 1 damage at the end of each round. If New Moon is in effect, you may restore 1 HP to this Pokémon at the end of each Round.

Name: Honey Gather
Effect: The Pokémon produces its own honey, you can get a small barrel of high quality honey every day. A small barrel of honey can be sold for up to $100. Honey attracts wild Pokémon and feeding a Pokémon with it will make it happy.
Description: The Pokémon produces its own honey, you can get a small barrel of high quality honey every day.

Name: Hubris
Effect: If a foe faints because of an attack dealt by this Pokémon, Increase 1 Point to its Special Attribute. Up to 3 points can be increased this way.

Name: Huge Power
Effect: This Pokémon has a permanent increase of 1 point to its Strength attribute.
Description: The pokémon has an unnatural source of strength beyond its physical appearance.

Name: Hunger Switch
Effect: At the End of the Round, switch this Pokémon's form. Only Morpeko may have this ability. This ability cannot be copied or switched.
Description: This Pokémon becomes really upset if it gets hungry, it will bite and act out unless you constantly give it snacks.

Name: Hustle
Effect: This Pokémon gets an extra -1 Reduced Accuracy and 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool for all its Physical Attacks.
Description: The Pokémon will perform everything in a hurry, usually being kind of sloppy.

Name: Hydration
Effect: When Rain weather is in effect, this Pokémon will cure any status ailment it has at the end of the round.
Description: The body of the Pokémon absorbs water and uses its moisture to maintain a healthy state.

Name: Hyper Cutter
Effect: This Pokémon cannot have its Strength Attribute reduced by any means.
Description: The claws of this Pokémon are very sharp and can't be dulled.

Name: Ice Body
Effect: If Hail Weather is in effect you may restore 1 HP to this Pokémon at the end of the round. This Pokémon is immune to damage from Hail weather.
Description: The Pokémon's body is almost frozen, it feels at home when temperatures are below zero

Name: Ice Cleats
Effect: If Hail Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Dexterity Attibute of this Pokémon.

Name: Ice Face
Effect: The Pokémon has 2 extra HP when it is on “Ice Face form”. If the Ice receives 2 damage, change the Pokémon's form to “No-Ice Form”. To restore “Ice Face Form” the Pokémon must be out one whole Round while Hail weather is active.
Description: This Pokémon's face is covered by a thick block of ice that serves as a cover of its body. If it breaks it will need a very cold temperature to form it again.

Name: Ice Scales
Effect: Reduce by 2 the Damage dealt to this Pokémon by All Special Attacks.
Description: This Pokémon's body is covered by crystal scales made of ice. Always cold to the touch, it easily deflects most projectiles, energy and light on its surface.

Name: Illuminate
Effect: Increases the chance of random Wild Pokémon encounters. If there were enviromental challenges where there is reduced visibility, this Pokémon and it's allies are immune to the effects.
Description: The Pokémon naturally produces light through its body. Other Pokémon approach curiously when they see this light.

Name: Illusion
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it will have the form of another Pokémon in the party, it will regain its original form if it receives damage. When taking a human form it cannot speak and its tail may remain visible.
Description: The Pokémon casts an illusion on itself to look like another creature it has seen. The illusion is indistinguishable from the real one.

Name: Immunity
Effect: Poison and Badly Poisoned Status deal no damage to this Pokémon.
Description: The Pokémon has a very strong immune system and will rarely get sick. It could even eat rotten food without getting sick.

Name: Imposter
Effect: As soon as it enters to battle, this Pokémon will be under the effects of the move Transform.
Description: This Pokémon can alter its own cell structure extremely fast to transform into a copy of another being.

Name: Infiltrator
Effect: Shield Moves, Safeguard, Substitute, Light Screen, and Reflect are ignored by this Pokémon.
Description: The Pokémonis very stealthy with it's movements, it is naturally harder to detect than others.

Name: Innards Out
Effect: If an attack would faint this Pokémon, it inflicts damage on the foe equal to whatever remaining HP it had.

Name: Inner Focus
Effect: This Pokémon does not Flinch and cannot be Intimidated. (Intimidate Ability does not have any effect against this Pokémon.)
Description: The Pokémon is extrmely serious and focused on everything it does. It remains calm and never backs down, even if it's getting severly injured.

Name: Insomnia
Effect: This Pokémon is not affected by the Sleep Status.
Description: The Pokémon does not need to sleep, it will be awake no matter the hour.

Name: Intimidate
Effect: When this Pokémon comes into battle, Reduce 1 Point to the Strength of all foes in range. This effect will last for as long as this Pokémon is out. Reduce random encounters with wild Pokémon.
Description: This Pokémon has an overwhelming presence that inspires both fear and respect from others.

Name: Intoxicate
Effect: Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokémon uses will deal damage as if they were Poison-Type. Affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 extra Die of Damage to Poison Moves.

Name: Intrepid Sword
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon enters battle, Increase 2 Points to its Strength. Outside of battle, this Pokémon can cut through any surface.
Description: This audacious Pokémon is fearless to any challenge, its strength increases through sheer will. Its presence can be very menacing.

Name: Irrelephant
Effect: Moves performed by this Pokemon ignores type based immunity.

Name: Iron Barbs
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Non- Ranged Physical Attack, Roll 1 Die of Damage against the attacker.
Description: This Pokémon is covered with sharp steel quils that hurt anyone who may touch them carelessly

Name: Iron Fist
Effect: Add 1 Dice to the Damage Pool of Fist Based moves.
Description: The hands of this pokémon are very strong and heavy, when curled into fists they can go through anything.

Name: Justified
Effect: The first time this Pokémon is hit by a Dark-Type Attack or if it has witnessed something it considers unjust, Increase 1 Point to its Strength Attribute.
Description: This Pokémon has an innate sense of justice, wrongdoings will make them really angry.

Name: Keen Eye
Effect: This Pokémon cannot have successes removed from its Accuracy rolls by Moves, Items or Abilities. Pain Penalizations and Difficulty Penalties may still apply.
Description: This Pokémon has an exceptional sight, locating small or far away objects will be a lot easier.

Name: Klutz
Effect: Held items won't have any effect on this Pokémon.
Description: This Pokémon does not understand how to use tools correctly, usually using them in unexpected ways.

Name: Leaf Guard
Effect: If Sunny weather is in effect, this Pokémon can't have any Status Conditions inflicted. Previously inflicted conditions remain.
Description: The leaves on this Pokémon expand with the sun to cover its body.

Name: Lernean
Effect: The Pokemon gains additional heads when it loses hp. One at 80%, 60%, 40% and 20%. Each head adds an additional 1 damage die to the Pokemon. Restoring HP does not remove the heads and they will only disappeaar when the user cancels the Mega Evolution.

Name: Levitate
Effect: Ground-Type moves and effects on the ground won't affect this Pokémon. If a Pokémon uses a move that binds it to the ground the effects are lost until it is free again.
Description: The Pokémon floats to move around without touching the ground.

Name: Libero
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon uses a move, first change its type to that of the move. If the move is an attack and deals damage, use the appropriate STAB.
Description: This Pokémon always has its mind in the game. It will favor a defensive position and make the best special passes when it finally attacks.

Name: Light Metal
Effect: This Pokemon weighs 50% less than it's supposed to. Moves with damage based on weight get their damage pool modified accordingly.
Description: The material covering its body will be light as a feather, causing this Pokémon to weigh from 50% to 75% less than it is supposed to.

Name: Lightning Rod
Effect: If anyone uses an Electric-Type move with a Single target, it will be redirected to this Pokémon; it is immune to damage from them. The first time this Pokémon is hit by an Electric-Type move, Increase 1 Point to this Pokemon's Special.
Description: This Pokémon will attract lightning and electricity to itself to charge its power.

Name: Limber
Effect: This Pokémon is not affected by the Paralysis Status.
Description: The muscles of this Pokémon are incredibly flexible and elastic. Easing their movement, agility, and grace.

Name: Liquid Ooze
Effect: If hit by a move that would asborb this Pokemon's vital energy (Leech seed, Dream Eater, Drain Punch, etc.) it will instead deal that amount as damage.
Description: The Pokémon produces a pestilent and toxic ooze within its body. Do not attempt to eat it.

Name: Liquid Voice
Effect: All Sound-Based Moves this Pokémon uses are considered Water-Type.
Description: Sound waves from its voice turn the moisture in the air into water, seemingly conjuring dew, rain, and even cascades out of nothing.

Name: Long Reach
Effect: All Attacks made by this Pokémon are considered Ranged attacks.
Description: The Pokémon is able to attack through the shadows of objects and foes meanwhile the real targets suffer the damage.

Name: Magic Bounce
Effect: All Support moves that target this Pokémon or its side of the battlefield will have its effects redirected into the foe's instead.
Description: The Pokémon will use psychic control on its foe to make it indirectly harm itself, making it look like magic.

Name: Magic Guard
Effect: This Pokémon won't receive damage from Status Conditions, Recoil, Held Item or Weather Conditions
Description: The Pokémon is covered by a faint energy that stops any minor harm that may come its way.

Name: Magician
Effect: This Pokémon will steal the Held Item of a foe it just hit.
Description: This Pokémon excells at performing simple magic tricks that amaze others, such as conjuring and vanishing objects nearby in the blink of an eye.

Name: Magma Armor
Effect: This Pokémon is not affected by the Frozen Status.
Description: The body of the Pokémon is always hot to the touch, it can heat a large room just by standing inside and can also endure high temperatures.

Name: Magnet Pull
Effect: All Steel-Type Pokémon on the field are Blocked.
Description: This Pokémon can activate a magnetic field around itself to attract all kinds of metals.

Name: Marvel Scale
Effect: If this Pokémon has a Status Ailment, Increase 2 points to its Defense Attribute.
Description: The beautiful scales of this Pokémon will harden when its body is under stress.

Name: Mega Launcher
Effect: Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage pool/Healing Pool of moves with the keyword “Pulse” and “Aura” on their name.
Description: The cannons on this Pokémon's body allow it to fire extremely powerful attacks.

Name: Merciless
Effect: If the Foe is inflicted with Poison or Badly Poison, all of this Pokémon Moves are considered to be Critical Hits. This Pokémon will not hold back when using Lethal Damage Moves at Storyteller's discretion.
Description: Once this Pokémon senses weakness, it begins acting according to their brutal nature. They can be cruel if not put in their place.

Name: Mimicry
Effect: If there is a Terrain Move active (i.e. Electric Terrain, Psyichic Terrain etc.) Change this Pokémon's main type to match the active Terrain. Restore its original main type if the terrain effects end.
Description: This Pokémon's body is perfect for camouflaging in the ground. It can sometimes get lost but you will find it if some unfortunate victim steps on it.

Name: Minus
Effect: If an ally Pokémon on the field has the ability “Plus”, Increase 2 Points to the Special Attribute of this Pokémon.
Description: This Pokémon has a natural Negative charge. It will attract Positive charge and repel other negative charge. They are prone to feel blue.

Name: Mirror Armor
Effect: All Attribute-reducing effects that target this Pokémon or its side of the battlefield will have its effects redirected into the foe's instead.
Description: The Pokémon's body is covered with a shiny armor. Said armor will repel and bounce back anything intending to weaken it.

Name: Misty Surge
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of the Move Misty Terrain. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant Terrain)
Description: The Pokémon can surround itself with a misty field that is eerily quiet, it feels peaceful and soothing but also lonesome and isolated.

Name: Mold Breaker
Effect: If a foe Pokémon has a type, an immunity, or an Ability that would prevent this Pokémon from attacking with a certain Move, ignore it.
Description: This Pokémon will find unusual ways to achieve its goals. They are inventive and go around problems.

Name: Moody
Effect: At the end of each round, reset Attributes modified by Moody, then Reduce 1 Point to a random Attribute and Increase 1 Point to another random Attribute.
Description: The Pokémon will have some severe mood swings, and be temperamental most of the time. Hopefully it's just a phase.

Name: Motor Drive
Effect: The first time this Pokémon is hit by an Electric-type move, Increase 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute. This Pokémon doesn't receive damage from Electrictype moves.
Description: This Pokémon absorbs electricity and stores it as energy to run faster.

Name: Moxie
Effect: If a foe faints because of an attack dealt by this Pokémon, Increase 1 Point to its Strength Attribute. Up to 3 points can be increased this way.
Description: This Pokémon is naturally fierce and will try to get to a position of power by defeating the alphas in the pack.

Name: Multiscale
Effect: If this Pokémon was at full health, Reduce by 1 the damage dealt by an attack.
Description: This Pokémon is covered by two layers of hard scales, if one layer is damaged it will be shed and regrown later.

Name: Multitype
Effect: This Pokémon can freely change its Type at any moment. This Ability can't be copied, switched, changed, ignored, or negated in any way.
Description: All the energies that created the universe flow raw through this Pokémon's body and it harnesses whichever is more convenient at the moment.

Name: Mummy
Effect: When this Pokémon hits or gets hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, the foe's ability is changed to Mummy.
Description: This Pokémon will curse whoever dares to inflict harm upon them, the curse may even last for generations and will need the aid of a medium to lift it.

Name: Natural Cure
Effect: At the end of the round, if this Pokémon has a Status Ailment, it Rolls 3 Chance Dice to heal itself.
Description: This Pokémon's body will generate substances to heal itself. They can be used to create medicine.

Name: Neuroforce
Effect: This Pokémon will deal 1 automatic Damage on any Move that is Super Effective against a foe.
Description: This Pokémon's psychic power is overwhelming and can be felt even by simply standing nearby. It will exploit any weakness it finds in your mind.

Name: Neutralizing Gas
Effect: Foe Pokémon in range will have their Abilities effects negated as long as this Pokémon is out.
Description: The Pokémon is surrounded by a sweet-smelling but noxious gas. Most poeple and Pokémon can't help but to stop and smell it, though.

Name: No Guard
Effect: You can declare you won't make any Evasion Action at the start of the Round. If you do, roll all moves of this Pokémon as if they had no reduced accuracy.
Description: This Pokémon can focus on attacking perfectly but will be open to the attacks of its foes as it won't focus on anything but its precision.

Name: Noctem
Effect: [Insurgence] When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of New Moon. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant weather)

Name: Normalize
Effect: All the moves known by this Pokémon are considered Normal Type. Affecting STAB, weaknesses, immunities, and resistances. Add 1 Dice of Damage to all Normal Moves.
Description: The Pokémon's actions are never impressive, always dull and never seem to accomplish anything exceptional.

Name: Oblivious
Effect: This Pokémon is not affected by the Love Status. It is immune to the effects of moves that affect its feelings such as Taunt, Charm, Captivate etc.
Description: This Pokémon will rarely have a satisfactory social interaction. It'll be too self-absorbed to take the hints of what is expected from it.

Name: Omnitype
Effect: The user is considered all types when defending.

Name: Overcoat
Effect: This Pokémon won't be damaged by weather conditions.
Description: The Pokémon will have a protective coat surrounding its body that allows it to live under extreme weather conditions.

Name: Overgrow
Effect: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Grass-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.
Description: When this Pokémon is hurt, it will grow huge plants in its body to defend itself, these plants are very strong but wither quickly.

Name: Own Tempo
Effect: This Pokémon is not affected by the Confused Status.
Description: This Pokémon will do everything at its own pace, peer pressure will be ignored. Its behavior reflexive and calm... maybe too calm.

Name: Parental Bond
Effect: All of the Damage Pools of this Pokémon get rolled twice. Choose the highest roll to deal damage to the foe.
Description: The Pokémon and its youngling are really close to each other, they do everything together. The parent is very protective.

Name: Pastel Veil
Effect: User and Allies in range are immune to Poison and Badly Poison. If the condition was inflicted before this Pokémon came out, it will remain.
Description: The Pokémon is surrounded by a soft-colored glimmer this energy feels pure and full of innocence. Unattainable and otherworldly.

Name: Pendulum
Effect: Increases the damage pool of moves by 1 when used consecutively up to 3 times.

Name: Periodic Orbit
Effect: Moves like Future Sight, Doom Desire and Wish will now activate twice. For example, Future Sight and Doom Desire will now activate once on the 2nd turn and then trigger again on the 4th turn. Wish will activate on the next round and a 2nd time on the 2nd round.

Name: Perish Body
Effect: If this Pokémon is hit with Non-Ranged Physical Attack, the Foe will receive its remaining HP as damage and faint after three Rounds, unless it is removed from battle.
Description: This Pokémon slently curses those who cross it. Condemning their souls to suffer as it has suffered. Avoid this Pokémon, lest you suffer its grudge.

Name: Phototroph
Effect: If Sunny weather is in effect, you may restore 1 HP to this Pokémon at the end of each Round. You can still restore 1 HP at the end of each round without Sunny weather but only 5 per day. This ability is disabled during New Moon and Rainy weather.

Name: Pickup
Effect: If this Pokémon was out of its Pokéball, at the end of the scene see what it found for you at Storyteller's discretion.
Description: This Pokémon will often gather objects and keep a small hoard of treasure it may share with you.

Name: Pickpocket
Effect: If this Pokémon is not holding an Item it will steal the held Item of the foe it just hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack.
Description: The Pokémon will instinctively steal from others. It takes whatever it can when people are not looking.

Name: Pixilate
Effect: Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokémon uses will deal damage as if they were Fairy-Type. Affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 extra Die of Damage to Fairy Moves.
Description: This Pokémon scatters fairy dust that brings happy thoughts to the mind. Everything it does is incredibly adorable.

Name: Plus
Effect: If an ally Pokémon has the ability “Minus”, Increase 2 Points to the Special Attribute of this Pokémon.
Description: This Pokémon has a natural Positive charge. It will attract negative charge and repel other positive charge. It has a red blush all the time.

Name: Poison Heal
Effect: If this Pokémon becomes poisoned or badly poisoned. It will Heal 1 HP at the end of each round instead of receiving damage. The Poison will be completely absorbed after 3 Rounds.
Description: The Pokémon has an immunity to any poison and also assimilates that venom as an energy source.

Name: Poison Point
Effect: If this Pokémon is hit by a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, Roll 3 Chance Dice to Poison the foe.
Description: The point thorns and scales on this Pokémon releases poison that will infect anyone who touches them roughly. Wear gloves when handling them.

Name: Poison Touch
Effect: If this Pokémon hits its foe with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, Roll 2 Chance Dice to Poison the foe.
Description: Venomous substances will ooze through the body of this Pokémon, you'll become very sick if it touches you.

Name: Power Construct
Effect: At the end of the Round, if this Pokémon has half or less of its HP, change its Form to the next one. When this Pokémon changes Form, remove Status Ailments & restore its full HP & Will. This Ability can't be copied, switched, or changed.
Description: Small cells gather around this Pokémon and are absorbed into its body. It grows bigger and stronger as more cells come together.

Name: Power of Alchemy
Effect: For the next 24 Hours the Pokémon copies the ability of a fainted foe. Multiple Abilities may be copied this way, but only one may be active during combat. (Certain Abilities cannot be copied at Storyteller's Discretion)
Description: This Pokémon can absorb the essence of everything it touches, fusing with the chemical composition and even the genes of discarded trash.

Name: Power Spot
Effect: Increase 1 Extra Die to the Damage Pools from Moves of One Ally. This Effect does not stack on the same Ally if multiple Pokémon use this Ability.
Description: The Pokémon releases mysterious energy that messes up with electronics and compasses but can somehow make you feel very energized.

Name: Prankster
Effect: Add Pritority +1 to all Support moves of this Pokémon.
Description: This Pokémon will always have a mischievous twinkle in its eyes, no one around will be safe from its pranks.

Name: Pressure
Effect: While this Pokémon is out, reduce the total Will Points of all foes by half, rounded down.
Description: Being around this Pokémon will be very stressing and demanding, even the bravest will feel themselves faltering.

Name: Primordial Sea
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Typhoon Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate, The Pokémon with highest Will might keep the dominant weather)
Description: The torrential rain barely lets you breathe, the field quickly becomes flooded and you must swim to stay afloat. No fire can be ignited at a time like this.

Name: Prism Armor
Effect: Negate all automatic Damage from any Super Effective Move dealt to this Pokémon.
Description: This Pokémon's body is an incredibly resilient armor. It manages to withstand even hits that should shatter it to pieces.

Name: Prism Guard
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a non-contact Attack, Roll 1 Die of damage against the attacker.

Name: Propeller Tail
Effect: Ignore any Moves or Abilities that would redirect this Pokémon's Moves into another target. (i.e. The Move “Follow Me”, the Ability “Lightining Rod” etc.)
Description: The Pokémon's tail allows it to maneuver very easily while in the water. It has no problem making sudden sharp turns to persue and catch its prey.

Name: Protean
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon uses a move, first change its type to that of the move. If the move is an attack and deals damage, use the appropriate STAB.
Description: This Pokémon's versitile body gives it profeciency on practically everything it sets out to do.

Name: Protean Maxima
Effect: Whenever Eevee uses a move that corresponds with its evolution. Switch its form to said Eeveelution. Eevee gains the type, stats as well as the abilities of said Eeveelution in addition to Protean Maxima.

Name: Psychic Surge
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of the Move Psychic Terrain. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant Terrain)
Description: The Pokémon can surround itself with a psychic field that makes everyone pause, hearing things that are not there.

Name: Psycho Call
Effect: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Psychic-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

Name: Punk Rock
Effect: Sound-Based Moves this Pokémon uses have 1 Extra Die to their Damage Pool. Sound-Based Moves deal 2 less Damage to this Pokémon.
Description: The Pokémon loves music and loud noises. It is constantly jamming with its air guitar and can easily improvise a music number out of nothing.

Name: Pure Power
Effect: This Pokémon has a permanent increase of 1 point to its Strength attribute.
Description: The Pokémon makes use of its psychic powers to move objects several times bigger.

Name: Queenly Majesty
Effect: Foes cannot use Priotity Moves against this Pokémon.
Description: This Pokémon's presence commands awe and respect. Others have no choice but to do as it says, whoever tries to outplay it, will feel its discontent

Name: Quick Draw
Effect: (provisional) Enables the Pokémon to move first occasionally. (1 Chance Die)

Name: Quick Feet
Effect: While affected by any Status Condition, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Dexterity Attribute. The Pokémon may be inflicted with Paralysis condition but this Ability prevents its effects.
Description: Most of the time this Pokémon will seem to be in a hurry. When Pressured it will move faster than normal.

Name: Rain Dish
Effect: If Rain weather is in effect, you may restore 1 HP to this Pokémon at the end of each Round.
Description: The Pokémon will store rain water for drink and nourishment.

Name: Rattled
Effect: The first time this Pokémon is hit by a Bug, Dark, or Ghost-Type Attack, increase 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute.
Description: When this scaredy Pokémon becomes startled or scared it will make haste to get away from danger.

Name: Receiver
Effect: If an Ally is fainted in battle, this Pokémon may copy their ability for the next 24 hours. Only one Ability may be copied this way. (Certain Abilities cannot be copied at Storyteller's Discretion)
Description: This Pokémon is used to learning the tactic behavior of other Pokémon with which they have a bond.

Name: Reckless
Effect: When this Pokémon performs a move with Recoil, Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of that move.
Description: The Pokémon will often get into risky situations in order to get what it wants. They are prone to risk their lives without thinking of the consequences.

Name: Refrigerate
Effect: Normal-Type Attacks that the Pokémon uses will deal damage as if they were Ice-Type. Affecting STAB, weakness and resistance. Add 1 Die of Damage to Ice moves.
Description: This Pokémon's body works akin to a freezer, it can freeze things just by touching them.

Name: Regenerator
Effect: This Pokémon may Heal up to 4 Damage or up to 2 Lethal Damage on its own every day. The Pokémon must be out of combat to benefit from this effect.
Description: The body of this Pokémon will regenerate from damage really quick, wounds that would take days to heal will get better in a few hours.

Name: Regurgitation
Effect: When Sand Tomb is active, everytime Delta Muk attacks, it will perform a second attack that has 2 damage rolls.. The typing is based on the primary type of the Pokemon caught in the Sand Tomb

Name: Ripen
Effect: Moves that use berries for added effects will have 2 Extra Dice on their Damage Pool (i.e. “Natural Gift” etc.) Increase the Healing properties of Berries at Storyteller's discretion.
Description: The Pokémon can Riped fruits and berries in no time to make them extra sweet and delicious, healing berries will have their effects boosted.

Name: Rivalry
Effect: If this Pokémon has a foe of the same gender, Increase 1 Point to its Strength Attribute. If the foe is the opposite gender, Reduce 1 Point to its Strength Attribute.
Description: The Pokémon will be very competitive with others to prove its position as the alpha of the group, however, it will try to gain the favor of possible mates.

Name: RKS System
Effect: Change the Pokemon's Type to match the Disc on its Held Item slot. (i.e. Electric Disc makes this Pokémon become an Electric Type)
Description: The Pokémon's physiology morphs according to the data disc inserted in its RKS-drive. There are 17 discs, one for each Type. (No disc is Normal Type).

Name: Rock Head
Effect: This Pokémon will not receive damage from Recoil.
Description: The head and body of the Pokémon are so resistant that they barely feel anything. Careful as they bump into things without even noticing.

Name: Rough Skin
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, Roll 1 Die of damage against the attacker.
Description: Use Protection on your hands when touching this Pokémon. Its body is covered by sharp scales or barbs that get hooked into the skin.

Name: Run Away
Effect: This Pokémon cannot be Blocked. It may also obtain bonus dice to escape from battle or captivity at Storyteller's discretion.
Description: This Pokémon is a master of escape. It will be difficult to catch and can even squeeze through the tiniest gaps to get away.

Name: Sand Force
Effect: If Sandstorm Weather is in effect when this Pokémon deals damage using Ground, Steel or Rock-Type attacks, add 1 Extra Die to the damage pool of that attack. The Pokémon is immune to damage from Sandstorm Weather.
Description: The Pokémon controls the particles of sand around the battlefield to give boosts to its attacks.

Name: Sand Rush
Effect: If Sandstorm Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Dexterity Attibute of this Pokémon. The Pokémon is immune to damage from Sandstorm Weather.
Description: While sand whips across the battlefield, the Pokémon can paddle through it as if it was water.

Name: Sand Spit
Effect: If this Pokémon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical attack, it starts the effects of Sandstorm Weather. The effect lasts 4 rounds.
Description: The Pokémon slithers through the desert sand, eating some of it in the process, if it gets hot (or sneezes) a sandstorm will blow up.

Name: Sand Stream
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Sandstorm Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will, might keep the dominant weather)
Description: The Pokémon can activate a raging sandstorm around itself that will last for as long as it wants.

Name: Sand Veil
Effect: If Sandstorm Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Evasion of this Pokémon. The Pokémon is immune to damage from Sandstorm weather.
Description: The Pokémon's body is easily concealed by sand particles in the air.

Name: Sap Sipper
Effect: The first time this Pokémon is hit by a Grass-type attack, Increase 1 Point to its Strength Attribute instead of dealing damage. Grass-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokémon.
Description: This Pokémon's diet consists strickly of plants, it is particularly fond of sweet sap for nourishment.

Name: Schooling
Effect: Only Wishiwashi can use this Ability. When this Pokémon reaches half or less of its HP its allies will arrive, when they do, replace your Pokémon for Wishiwashi School-Form at full HP. Increase its Rank to Pro. At the end of the battle restore Wishiwashi to its base form. (Healing/Fainting/Recalling prevents allies from arriving)
Description: When this Pokémon is threatened, it calls thousands of allies to create an uncontrollable monster. The closer to the sea, the faster they arrive.

Name: Scrappy
Effect: This Pokémon has the ability to hit Ghost-type Pokémon with Normal-type and Fighting-type moves, dealing Regular Damage. Apply the right resistances or weaknesses to the foe if it has a secondary type.
Description: This Pokémon does not believe in ghosts.

Name: Screen Cleaner
Effect: When this Pokémon enters the field, remove any barries (i.e.Light Screen, Reflect etc.) on both the user and the foe's side of the field.
Description: This Pokémon is constantly cleaning an invisible screen, it cleans them so well that even real glass screens can disappear after it is done with them.

Name: Serene Grace
Effect: Add 2 Extra Chance Dice to all effects done by this Pokémon. (e.g. A move has 3 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe, will roll 5 Dice with this Pokémon)
Description: This Pokémon will bring good luck as if it was blessed by the heavens. Its presence is soothing, it makes you feel calm and full of joy.

Name: Shadow Call
Effect: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Dark-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

Name: Shadow Dance
Effect: If New Moon is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Dexterity Attibute of this Pokémon.

Name: Shadow Shield
Effect: If this Pokémon was at full health, Reduce by 2 the damage dealt by an attack. This effect cannot be ignored by Moves or Abilities.
Description: When it is at full strength, this Pokémon's ghostly body cannot be touched or pierced by anything, it can even go through walls as if they weren't there.

Name: Shadow Tag
Effect: All foes become Blocked. Ghost-type Pokémon are immune to this effect. Pokémon with the same ability are immune to this effect.
Description: The Pokémon steps on the opponent's shadow, preventing them from moving too far.

Name: Shed Skin
Effect: At the end of the round. If this Pokémon has a Status Condition, it rolls 3 Chance Dice to heal itself.
Description: This Pokémon is constantly growing skin anew and molting the old one when it becomes too damaged.

Name: Sheer Force
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon uses an attack with chance dice for an additional effect, you may ignore those chance dice and add 2 Dice to its damage pool.
Description: This Pokémon is only interested in showing off its incredible battle prowess.

Name: Shell Armor
Effect: If a foe lands a Critical Hit on this Pokémon, it will not get its Bonus Damage Dice for that attack.
Description: This Pokémon's shell protects its vulnerable spots from its opponents.

Name: Shield Dust
Effect: If this Pokémon is hit by an attack with chance dice for an additional effect, it won't be affected by said effects.
Description: This Pokémon constantly generates specs of dust to shield and protect itself.

Name: Shields Down
Effect: Only Minior can use this Ability. After reaching half or less of its HP in battle, replace Minior by Minior (Core) at full HP. To restore it to its base form, the core must be set free and then recaptured after it returns a few days later.
Description: The Pokémon's core is protected by a sturdy shield, if the shield is shattered the Pokémon starts acting crazy.

Name: Simple
Effect: If this Pokémon gets an Attribute reduced, reduce 1 more Point. If this Pokémon gets an Attribute increased, increase 1 more Point.
Description: This Pokémon's ingenious mind is easily swayed by not only its own, but also outside influences. It often finds ways to simplify things.

Name: Skill Link
Effect: Add 2 Dice to the Accuracy roll of Successive Actions.
Description: This Pokémon can proficiently chain a flurry of attacks. It also enjoys repitition and sequences.

Name: Sleet
Effect: If this Pokemon is in the field during Hail weather. All Pokemon that are not immune to Hail receive 2 damage rather than 1.

Name: Slow Start
Effect: During the first 5 Rounds of a battle, this Pokémon will always go last in the initiative order. After those 5 Rounds are over, Increase 2 points to its Strength and Dexterity Attributes, and it will always go first in the initiative order. This effect resets if the Pokémon is called out of combat.
Description: The Pokémon has remained dormant for thousand of years, its movements are heavy and slow, run away before it unleashes its full power.

Name: Slush Rush
Effect: If Hail Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Dexterity Attribute of this Pokémon. The Pokémon is immune to damage from Hail Weather.
Description: The Pokémon is used to run and hunt on icy terrain, moving swiftly through the snow during blizzards and ice storms.

Name: Sniper
Effect: If this Pokémon lands a Critical Hit, it will get 3 Bonus Dice to the Damage Pool of its attack instead of the regular 2.
Description: This Pokémon will stealthily locate itself in an advantageous position to strike its foe's weak spots.

Name: Snow Cloak
Effect: If Hail weather is in effect, Increase 1 Point to the Evasion of this Pokémon. The Pokémon is immune to damage from Hail weather.
Description: This Pokémon's skin blends well with the surrounding snow and hail, you can barely see it.

Name: Snow Warning
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Hail Weather. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle. (In case of stalemate the Pokémon with higher Will might keep the dominant weather)
Description: The Pokémon is able to call a terrible hailstorm at will. Snow will cover the battlefield and sharp ice shards will come plummeting from the sky.

Name: Solar Power
Effect: While Sunny Weather is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Special Attribute. If Sunny weather is in effect, this Pokémon will receive 1 damage at the end of the round.
Description: The Pokémon is capable of overcharging itself with energy from the sun, making it more powerful but also taking a toll on its body.

Name: Solid Rock
Effect: If this Pokémon is hit by a move dealing Super-Effective Damage, reduce 1 Damage dealt to it.
Description: This Pokémon's body is composed of extremely hard rock, protecting it from everything, even its own weaknesses.

Name: Soul Heart
Effect: If a foe faints because of an attack dealt by this Pokémon, Increase 1 Point to its Special Attribute. Up to 3 points can be increased this way.
Description: This Pokémon is naturally caring and nurturing and if there's a threat to its loved ones, its soul will be made stronger out of love.

Name: Soundproof
Effect: This Pokémon is immune to the damage and effects of all Sound-based moves.
Description: This Pokémon's body is structured to protect it from noises that might disturb its peace and focus. So it's not ignoring you, it just can't hear you.

Name: Spectral Jaws
Effect: If this Pokémon uses a move with the Keywords: Fang, Bite or Crunch, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of that Move. These moves are all converted to Special.

Name: Speed Boost
Effect: At the end of the Round, Increase 1 Point to this Pokémon's Dexterity Attribute. Up to 3 Points might be added this way.
Description: This Pokémon will start maneuvering at an accelerated rate, it will move as if it blinked from place to place.

Name: Speed Swap
Effect: When this Pokémon comes out, it automatically starts the effects of Trick Room. The effects end when the Pokémon leaves the battle.

Name: Spirit Call
Effect: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Ghost-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.

Name: Stakeout
Effect: Whenever a Foe Pokémon switches out, this Pokémon will inflict 1 additional Damage with its first successful attack to its replacement.
Description: The Pokémon is constantly surveilling its environment, looking out for possible prey, attacking them when they are most vulnerable.

Name: Stall
Effect: This Pokémon always goes last in the the initiative order.
Description: This Pokémon is indecisive and always lets others act first before making its mind on what action to take.

Name: Stalwart
Effect: Ignore any Moves or Abilities that would redirect this Pokémon's Moves into another target. (i.e. The Move “Follow Me”, the Ability “Lightining Rod” etc.)
Description: The Pokémon naturally has a high sense of duty and loyalty, once you give it a task it will not stay until its quest is complete.

Name: Stamina
Effect: The first time this Pokémon receives Damage in combat, increase 1 point to its Defense and Special Defense
Description: This pokémon cannot get tired. It regains its fortitude when it feels weak. Even when it barely eats or sleeps.

Name: Stance Change
Effect: Only Aegislash may use this Ability. At the beginning of the round, choose a Form. While in Sword Stance it can only use Attack moves. While in Shield Stance, it can only use Support Moves. Adjust its Attributes according to the Rank and Limits it has for each Form.
Description: This Pokémon can change forms and become a mighty shield or a powerful blade. It's attributes switch upon a change of stance.

Name: Static
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, roll 3 Chance Dice to Paralyze its foe.
Description: This Pokémon's body is always ready to let off a jolt of static electricity at the slightest touch.

Name: Steadfast
Effect: The first time this Pokémon is affected by Flinch, Increase 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute.
Description: This Pokémon becomes even more dependable when adversity strikes.

Name: Steam Engine
Effect: The first time this Pokémon is hit with a Fire or Water-Type Move. Increase 3 Points to its Dexterity Atribute.
Description: The Pokémon works as a steam furnace, with a bit of fire and water it can move anything at great speeds. It also loves to eat coal.

Name: Steelworker
Effect: Steel-Type Attacks used by this Pokémon get 1 Extra Die to their Damage Pool.
Description: The Pokémon is capable of molding and eating steel, giving shape and a sharper edge to whatever metal it touches.

Name: Steely Spirit
Effect: Steel-Type Attacks used by this Pokémon and Allies get 1 Extra Die to their Damage Pool.
Description: The Pokémon has a balky behaviour most of the time. if it sets its mind to something it will see it done. Infuriating and inspiring at the same time.

Name: Stench
Effect: Reduces the chance of random Wild Pokémon encounters. Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, it Rolls 1 Chance Dice to Flinch the foe.
Description: This Pokémon can emit a smell so unpleasant it repels other people and Pokémon.

Name: Sticky Hold
Effect: This Pokémon's Held Item cannot be removed, stolen or swapped by Moves or Abilities.
Description: This Pokémon's body is always oozing adhesive substances, if something gets glued, it will be very difficult to remove.

Name: Storm Drain
Effect: If anyone uses a Water-Type move with a Single target, it will be redirected to this Pokémon; it is immune to damage from them. The first time this Pokémon is hit by a Water-Type move, Increase 1 Point to this Pokemon's Special.
Description: The Pokémon absorbs moisture and liquids like a sponge, then uses them to increase its power and last more time outside of water.

Name: Strong Jaw
Effect: If this Pokémon uses a move with the Keywords: Fang, Bite or Crunch, add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of that Move.
Description: The Pokémon's strong jaw gives it tremendous biting power. Its teeth can tear through almost anything.

Name: Sturdy
Effect: The first time this Pokémon would faint due to a Damaging move, it will remain at 1 HP instead. Status Conditions and Self inflicted damage will still cause it to faint. The Pokémon must rest for an hour before benefiting from Sturdy again.
Description: This Pokémon's body is extremely resistant to damage, it can withstand almost anything.

Name: Suction Cups
Effect: The Pokémon is immune to effects that force switches.
Description: This Pokémon's limbs contain suckers that allow it to stay rooted in place. It can stick to any kind of surface, even upside down.

Name: Supercell
Effect: If New Moon and Rainy Weather is in effect, increase 1 Point to the Special Attibute of this Pokémon.

Name: Super Luck
Effect: Add “High Critical” to all the Attack Moves of this Pokémon. If a move already has the High Critical property, this Pokémon will only need 1 More Success on the Accuracy roll to land a Critical instead of 2.
Description: This Pokémon has an incredible good luck, good things happen to it regularly.

Name: Surge Surfer
Effect: If Electric Terrain is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Dexterity Attribute.
Description: This Pokémon's magnetic field allows it to stand and surf on top of electric currents as if it were floating.

Name: Swarm
Effect: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Bug-Type Moves, and they will get 1 extra die to their Damage Pool.
Description: The Pokémon enters a hive mind state when its life is on the line, becoming more feral and aggressive.

Name: Sweet Veil
Effect: The Pokémon and its allies are immune to the Sleep status. Increase random encounters with Wild Pokémon.
Description: This Pokémon's delicious aroma will wake the appetite of all Pokémon nearby.

Name: Swift Swim
Effect: If Rain Weather is in effect, Increase 2 Points to this Pokémon's Dexterity Attribute.
Description: The Pokémon will move faster in water than on land, even a puddle covered roadway will allow it to use its full speed.

Name: Symbiosis
Effect: If an ally loses or spends its Held Item, this Pokémon will immediately give the one it's holding to the ally as a free action.
Description: This Pokémon enjoys forming a beneficial reletionship with any ally it teams up with.

Name: Synchronize
Effect: If a foe inflicts a Status Condition to this Pokémon, the same condition is inflicted into the foe unless it is immune to the effect.
Description: The Pokémon can share its mood, feelings and sensations with others, especially with those who caused it pain.

Name: Tangled Feet
Effect: While this Pokémon is Confused, Add an extra -2 “Reduced Accuracy” to all the foe's Moves which target this Pokémon.
Description: The Pokémon moves in a very strange and particular way when dizzy or confused, this usually works to its advantage.

Name: Tangling Hair
Effect: The first time a foe hits this Pokémon with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, reduce 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute.
Description: This Pokémon's hair is thick and tough, it easily tangles anyone who comes close to it. Brush it twice a day to keep it silky and shiny.

Name: Technician
Effect: Add 1 dice to the Damage pool of all Moves with Power 2 or less.
Description: This Pokémon is meticulous and precise in tasks that everyone else would perform roughly and without care.

Name: Telepathy
Effect: This Pokémon won't receive damage from moves performed by its allies.
Description: This Pokémon can communicate using telepathy. It can send messages to other minds but it cannot receive messages back.

Name: Teravolt
Effect: If a Move, Item or Ability would prevent this Pokémon from targeting a foe or inflicting an effect, ignore it. (e.g. A Pokémon with Immunity can be Poisoned, A Pokémon with Levitate can be hit by Ground moves).
Description: There's a ball of blue lightning coming out of this Pokémon that prevents its foes from being out of reach, no matter what you do, it will zap you.

Name: Thick Fat
Effect: Reduce by 1 the damage taken from Fire and Ice-Type moves.
Description: This Pokémon's body has a thick layer of blubber that protects it against against harsh temperatures.

Name: Tinted Lens
Effect: If a foe has a resistance against an attack performed by this Pokémon, make that attack deal Regular Damage instead. If the foe has a double resistance, make the attack as if the foe had only one.
Description: This Pokémon's goggle-like eyes can find the good side in every bad situation, even when there is none.

Name: Torrent
Effect: When this Pokémon's HP is at half or less, Pain Penalization will not reduce successes from Damage rolls of its Water-Type Moves, and they will get 1 Extra Die to their Damage Pool.
Description: This Pokémon builds up pressure to shoot water streams. When that pressure cannot be held in, it is released through uncontrollable torrents.

Name: Tough Claws
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon uses a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, Add 1 Die to its damage pool.
Description: This Pokémon's claws are so sturdy, they can tear through almost anything.

Name: Toxic Boost
Effect: If this Pokémon gets the Poison or Badly Poison Status, Increase 2 Point to its Strength Attribute.
Description: The blood of this Pokémon boils and goes into a powerful rampage whenever it is afflicted by poison.

Name: Trace
Effect: This Pokémon copies the ability of one random foe when it comes out. Effect ends if this Pokémon is removed from the battle. Some Abilities (Flower Gift, Illusion, Imposter, Stance Change, Wonder Guard etc.) Can't be copied.
Description: This Pokémon mimics the special characteristics of the others, making them look as if they were its own.

Name: Triage
Effect: Add Pritority +1 to all Support moves of this Pokémon that Heal HP or cure Status Ailments.
Description: The Pokémon feels the urgency to treat the injured; it is also very quick to stitch and make knots. A skill often used to instantly mend wounds.

Name: Truant
Effect: Roll this Pokemon's Loyalty every other turn, and score at least 2 successes. If the roll fails this Pokémon refuses to act. If it is successful it may act normally.
Description: This Pokémon is extremely lazy, it won't make even the tiniest effort and often loafs off even in the heat of battle.

Name: Turboblaze
Effect: If a Move, Item or Ability would prevent this Pokémon from targeting a foe or inflicting an effect, ignore it. (e.g. A Pokémon with Immunity can be Poisoned, A Pokémon with Levitate can be hit by Ground moves).
Description: The Pokémon surrounds everything with a giant ball of swirling flames that prevents its foes from being out of reach, there is no escaping the heat.

Name: Unaware
Effect: This Pokémon ignores any of the opponent's Attribute increases or decreases. Both when attacking and taking damage.
Description: The Pokémon is oblivious to many details in its surroundings, it will rarely take notice of things going on.

Name: Unburden
Effect: The first time this Pokémon loses or spends its held item and is no longer holding any, Increase 2 Points to its Dexterity Attribute.
Description: This Pokémon is most comfortable when it is freed from having to carry stuff around. It loves to be able to move without restrictions.

Name: Unleafed
Effect: When Mega evolving or on switch in. Increase the user's Strength, Defense, Special, Special Defense and Dexterity by 1. These boosts lasts for X + 1 turns where X is the number of fainted Pokemon in this Pokemon's team.

Name: Unnerve
Effect: Opponents may not consume their held berry while this Pokémon is in the field.
Description: It may be its powerful gaze or its menacing presence, but others near this Pokémon become really nervous to the point where they lose their appetite.

Name: Vampiric
Effect: When using a contact move, the user restores hp equal to a quarter of the damage dealt, rounded down.

Name: Vaporization
Effect: All Water Type moves including Support moves will fail. Water Type Pokemon take 1 damage per round.

Name: Venomous
Effect: The Pokemon will inflict Poison+ in place of regular Poison.

Name: Victory Star
Effect: This Pokémon's and All its allies damaging moves gain “Never Miss” while this Pokémon is on the field. This Ability can't be switched or swapped.
Description: This Pokémon's presence is an incredible boost for morale. Those who get its favor will be guided to victory.

Name: Vital Spirit
Effect: The Pokémon is immune to the Sleep status.
Description: The Pokémon is incredibly active and energetic. It needs constant activity and exercise or else it will act destructive. It never sleeps.

Name: Volt Absorb
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon is hit by an Electric-Type Move, you may Heal 1 HP instead of receiving damage. Electric-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokémon.
Description: This Pokémon's body is practically a battery that is always happy to become charged to full capacity.

Name: Wandering Spirit
Effect: If this Pokémon hits a Foe with a Non-Ranged Physical Attack, it switches its Ability with the Foe's. Some Abilities (Flower Gift, Illusion, Imposter, Stance Change, Wonder Guard etc.) can't be switched at Storyteller's discretion.
Description: The Pokémon is a wandering ghost with a haunted expression on its face. It won't heed your call and might get lost floating aimlessly. Get to a medium to heal it.

Name: Water Absorb
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon is hit by a Water-Type Move, you may Heal 1 HP instead of receiving damage. Water-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokémon.
Description: The Pokémon's body is mostly made of water, it stores water inside itself and uses it for nourishment.

Name: Water Bubble
Effect: Fire-Type Moves deal 1 less damage to this Pokémon. This Pokémon is immune to Burn 1 and Burn 2 Status. Add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool of this Pokémon's Water-Type Moves.
Description: The Pokémon is shielded by water bubble. Stragely, the bubble has clear water inside instead of air.

Name: Water Compaction
Effect: The fist time this Pokémon is hit by a Water-Type Move, Increase its Defense by 2 instead of receiving damage. Water-type moves do not deal damage to this Pokémon.
Description: The body of the Pokémon can absorb water at an astounding rate, its body hardens as it quickly dries.

Name: Water Veil
Effect: The Pokémon is immune to any of the Burn status.
Description: This Pokémon is always wet and producing water to keep itself moist. Thanks to this, the Pokémon can stay away from a body of water for a long time.

Name: Weak Armor
Effect: The first time this Pokémon is hit by any Physical Attack, Increase 1 Point to its Dexterity Attribute and Reduce 1 Point to its Defense.
Description: This Pokémon's protective outer layers can come off, allowing it to move freely and be more agile.

Name: White Smoke
Effect: Foes cannot reduce the Attributes of this Pokémon. However, it can still lower its own Attributes.
Description: The Pokémon is constantly releasing fumes of white smoke making it difficult to be seen. It uses the smoke to conceal itself.

Name: Wimp Out
Effect: Whenever this Pokémon reaches half of its total HP, it will switch out to its pokéball, sending an Ally to take its place. If there is no Ally, the battle may end. This Ability's effect is not affected by Block.
Description: The Pokémon goes into a lot of stress whenever its exoskeleton is weakened, it can escape from any situation out of sheer cowardice.

Name: Wind Force
Effect: The first time this Pokémon is hit by a Flying-Type move, add 1 Extra Die to the Damage Pool of Fire-type Moves this Pokémon uses until the end of the scene.

Name: Winter Joy
Effect: [Insurgence] During Winter, this Pokemon has its Strength and  Special increased by 2. However, it will have its Strength and Special decreased by 1 during Summer. Its stats remains unchanged in other seasons.

Name: Wonder Guard
Effect: This Pokémon only receives damage from Status Conditions, and from Moves that deal Super Effective damage against it. This Pokémon is immune to damage from other sources like weather conditions and entry hazards.
Description: This Pokémon's body is protected by an incredible otherworldly aura. Most things get through as if nothing was there.

Name: Wonder Skin
Effect: Reduce up to 2 Chance Dice from foes against this Pokémon. (Example: The move Ember has 1 Chance Dice to Burn the foe, against this Pokémon it has zero Chance Dice).
Description: The skin of this Pokémon is covered by a thin protective veil that allows it to weaken dangerous hazards.

Name: Zen Mode
Effect: Only Darmanitan may use this Ability. When at half or less of its HP, change to Zen Mode Form at the end of the Round. Use its Zen Mode Form from then on. Adjust its Attributes according to the Rank and Limits it has for each Form.
Description: Under extreme stress, this Pokémon will unlock its hidden psychic abilities through the power of meditation, it will go back to normal the next day.
